mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee explains his decision to turn down a potential monetary gift to the college. He mentions his efforts in the "private capacity" in suggesting proper means by which the state and country may best be restored.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Stuart, Samuel D.
Reconstruction (U.S. history, 1865-1877) -- Virginia
Brockenbrough, John W. (John White), 1806-1877

mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter to [John W. Brockenbrough], January 23, 1866 (correspondence)
